name: Slice n' Dice (GMTK Game Jam, July 2022)
name_original: Slice n' Dice (GMTK Game Jam, July 2022)
description:
Unreal Engine 4 game created for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam. 

Fight Hordes of Enemies in a cursed casino with your trusty Dice Sword - after a couple of swings, the sword will re-roll and change how you play. 

Credits-

Justin DaSilva - Gameplay Programmer
